---
title: "Workbench"
date: last-modified
---

* Shiny E-max calculator
* Shiny Hazard function calculator
* Half-life dosing table, e.g., dosing every half-life gives AR=2
* Convert Omega values to percentages
* Convert percentages to Omega values
* Calculate confidence interval (95%) given mean and SD
* Calculate half-life based on V and CL

## Unit converter

### Bilirubin

mg/dL -> μmol/L, multiply with 17.1
μmol/L -> mg/dL, divide by 17.1

### Creatinine

mg/dL -> μmol/L, multiply with 88.4
μmol/L -> mg/dL, divide by 88.4
